sentence.Network_en: His nails resemble the ivory keys of the spinet.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的指甲象白色的琴键一样.

sentence.Network_en: One afternoon, when I was better, I played the spinet.
sentence.Network_cn: 有天下午, 我好了一点时, 便弹奏钢琴.

sentence.Network_en: But the spinet was too big for me to play.
sentence.Network_cn: 但是钢琴太大了不适合我弹.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 有没有知道乐器的名字（十种以上）_百度知道 ... Player Piano 自动钢琴 Spinet 小型立式钢琴 Square Piano 长型钢琴.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译... ... spinelle 尖晶石 spinet 古竖琴 spininess 尖刺状.
...振动发出声音，大键琴(harpsichord)和古键琴(spinet)也是利用同样的发声原理，但演奏者在弹奏大键琴时，并无法随著敲键盘的力 …
音乐知识_百度知道 ... --键-- key --斯皮耐琴-- Spinet --簧乐器-- reed.

list.abs: she was the daughter of John Dandridge and Frances Jones . Martha was the eldest of 9 children . she enjoyed riding horses , gardening , sewing , playing the spinet and dancing .她是约翰.丹德瑞格和弗郎西斯.琼斯的大女儿，喜欢骑马，园艺，缝纫，弹竖琴和跳舞。
His nails resemble the ivory keys of the spinet ., 他的指甲象白色的琴键一样.
one of the servants put a bench in front of the spinet .有个侍从放了一张长凳在钢琴前。
but the spinet was too big for me to play .但是钢琴太大了不适合我弹。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: shortening of obsolete French espinette, from Italian spinetta 'virginal, spinet', diminutive of spina 'thorn' (see spine), the strings being plucked by quills

means.word_mean: 1. small and compactly built upright piano
2. early model harpsichord with only one string per note
